2024-05-01

    Package
    Description
    telegrambot
    Telegram bot for sending memes from the server to clients in chat

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BotInitializer
    An initializer that creates an HTTP client, authorization on the server, as well as creating and launching a telegram bot
    BotRequests
    Set of requests to the server
    BotRequestsInterceptor
    Request Interceptor
    TaskThread
    A thread that obtains the time after which the task will be executed, waits for this time, and executes the task

    Logic of telegram bot operation and auxiliary tools
